page.title: 11History of the church 2
page.content:
NAME. The name of Glinton church is S.T.Benedicts because at that time the Cathederal had Benedictine Monks in.Thechurch has two preasent wardens,MRS.NEVERSON and MR.SAUNDERS. These people have a crook to symbolise their position in the church.One of the wardens represents the Bishop and the other represents the Queen and the people.
GARGOYLS. The Gargoyls on Glinton church are to grighten away devil and drain the water off the roof.One of the Gargoyls is in a different possition because when they were built the Bishop didn't pay the mason enough money so he pointed it in a different position to embarrase the town.
